tool.name: Boxplot [SPAC] [DMAP]
tool.description: Create a boxplot visualization of the features in the analysis dataset. Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation
tool.command:
python '$__tool_directory__/format_values.py' 'galaxy_params.json' 'cleaned_params.json' --bool-values Horizontal_Plot Keep_Outliers Value_Axis_Log_Scale --list-values Feature_s_to_Plot
&& python '$__tool_directory__/boxplot_template.py' 'cleaned_params.json'

param.name: Table_to_Visualize
param.label: Table to Visualize
param.help: Source table to perform the visualization. Default is Original, referring to the raw dataset.

repeat.name: Feature_s_to_Plot_repeat
repeat.title: Feature(s) to Plot
repeat.help: The feature(s) to plot in the box plot. Leave empty or use 'All' to plot all features.

param.name: Primary_Annotation
param.label: Primary Annotation
param.help: The annotation to group the visualizations. Use 'None' to disable.

param.name: Secondary_Annotation
param.label: Secondary Annotation
param.help: Secondary annotation to create subdivisions within each category defined by the primary annotation. Default is 'None'.

param.name: Value_Axis_Log_Scale
param.label: Value Axis Log Scale
param.help: Make the Y-axis (or X-axis if horizontal) in log scale. Negative values in the data disable log scale.

param.name: Horizontal_Plot
param.label: Horizontal Plot
param.help: To plot the boxplot in horizontal orientation. Default is vertical.

param.name: Figure_DPI
param.label: Figure DPI
param.help: Higher the DPI, clearer the image.

param.name: Keep_Outliers
param.label: Keep Outliers
param.help: True to keep the outliers for every feature, False to remove them

tool.help:
**Boxplot [SPAC] [DMAP] v2.0**
This tool creates boxplot visualizations from spatial single-cell analysis data.
**Key Features:** - Uses Galaxy's auto-serialization (data_style="paths") - Parameters normalized by format_values.py - Output configuration handled by template - Debug outputs available for troubleshooting - Figures saved in directory structure
**Feature(s) to Plot:** - Add one or more features using the repeat control - Leave empty to plot all features (defaults to ["All"])
**Outputs:** - Summary: CSV file with summary statistics (output.csv) - Figure: PNG file with boxplot visualization (figures/boxplot.png) - Debug: Raw and cleaned parameter JSON files
**Technical Notes:** - Galaxy generates galaxy_params.json via configfiles - format_values.py normalizes parameters (no output injection) - Template handles its own output configuration: - figures: directory type containing plot files - dataframe: file type for summary CSV - Feature_s_to_Plot defaults to ["All"] when empty
